trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sugar Grove
There was one other sighting in Sugar Grove on or around December 7th 1995
divs: Sighting Details I was alone in my back yard, When I seen this object coming from the west flying directly over our houses approx 150 feet in the air. I first thought it might be an odd shaped balloon, because it was smooth and shiny. Gray in color. and it wasn't making any noise. As it passed over our house I thought "No it's not a balloon, there is no wind and this thing is going aprox 40 mph." There was no engine pods. no lights. no windows. no control surfaces. no trailing edge. ( All wings that I know about aren't rounded at the rear edge Like this craft was.) I've been to oshkosh a few times so I've seen a lot of planes, and I build and fly RC planes.
